bAutoRunDefaultAction: Should this blueprint automatically run OnDefaultActionClicked, or should it open up a details panel to edit properties and/or offer multiple buttons
OnEachSelectedActor: The method called for each selected actor when ForEachSelectedActor is called
OnEachSelectedAsset: The method called for each selected asset when ForEachSelectedAsset is called

methods.name: ClearActorSelectionSet
methods.doc: Remove all actors from the selection set

methods.name: ForEachSelectedActor
methods.doc: Calls OnEachSelectedActor for each selected actor

methods.name: ForEachSelectedAsset
methods.doc: Calls OnEachSelectedAsset for each selected asset

methods.name: GetActorReference
GetSelectedAssets
methods.doc: Gets the set of currently selected assets

methods.name: OnDefaultActionClicked
methods.doc: The default action called when the blutility is invoked if bAutoRunDefaultAction=true (it is never called otherwise)

methods.name: SelectNothing
methods.doc: Selects nothing in the editor (another way to clear the selection)

methods.name: SetActorSelectionState
methods.doc: Set the selection state for the selected actor
